import { CopyToClipboard } from '@looker/components'
import { Editor, excludedProps } from '@looker/storybook'
import { ArgsTable, Meta } from '@storybook/addon-docs'
import storyBasic from '!!raw-loader!./Basic'
import storySuccess from '!!raw-loader!./Success'
import storyChildComponent from '!!raw-loader!./ChildComponent'

<Meta component={CopyToClipboard} title="Docs/CopyToClipboard" />

# CopyToClipboard

<Editor code={storyBasic} />

### Label

`CopyToClipboard` offers props `children` and `success` both can be used to change the labels on the button by passing a string

<Editor code={storySuccess} />

### Customize Components

`CopyToClipboard` `children` and `success` support taking a `JSX.Element` instead of a simple string if you prefer

<Editor code={storyChildComponent} />

## Props

<ArgsTable of={CopyToClipboard} exclude={excludedProps} />
